code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware,compose}from'redux';import rootReducer from'./reducers';import thunk from'redux-thunk';var middleware=[thunk];var initState={};var store;var ReactReduxDevTools=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION__&&window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION__();if(window.navigator.userAgent.includes("Chrome")&&ReactReduxDevTools){store=createStore(rootReducer,initState,compose(applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middleware),ReactReduxDevTools));}else{store=createStore(rootReducer,initState,compose(applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middleware)));}export default store;
